sn22.25:1.2: “Mendicants, give up desire and greed for form.
sn22.25:1.3: Thus that form will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
sn22.25:1.4: Give up desire and greed for feeling …
sn22.25:1.11: Thus that consciousness will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.”
